event.description: Ichiro Suzuki singles on a ground ball to shortstop Mike Aviles.
With Franklin Gutierrez batting, Ichiro Suzuki steals (5) 2nd base.
Franklin Gutierrez strikes out swinging.
Jose Lopez singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop Mike Aviles. Ichiro Suzuki to 3rd.
Russell Branyan strikes out swinging.
Adrian Beltre lines out to second baseman Willie Bloomquist.
Ken Griffey singles on a ground ball to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Wladimir Balentien grounds into a double play, shortstop Mike Aviles to second baseman Willie Bloomquist to first baseman Billy Butler. Ken Griffey out at 2nd.
Rob Johnson strikes out swinging.
Ronny Cedeno strikes out swinging.
Ichiro Suzuki doubles (2) on a fly ball to right fielder Jose Guillen.
Franklin Gutierrez strikes out swinging.
Jose Lopez pops out to shortstop Mike Aviles in foul territory.
Russell Branyan grounds out, shortstop Mike Aviles to first baseman Billy Butler.
Adrian Beltre singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Jose Guillen.
Ken Griffey grounds into a double play, first baseman Billy Butler to shortstop Mike Aviles. Adrian Beltre out at 2nd.
Wladimir Balentien flies out to right fielder Jose Guillen.
Rob Johnson strikes out swinging.
Ronny Cedeno strikes out on a foul tip.
Ichiro Suzuki walks.
Franklin Gutierrez reaches on a fielding error by shortstop Mike Aviles. Ichiro Suzuki to 2nd.
Jose Lopez grounds into a double play, third baseman Mark Teahen to second baseman Willie Bloomquist to first baseman Billy Butler. Ichiro Suzuki to 3rd. Franklin Gutierrez out at 2nd.
Russell Branyan pops out softly to shortstop Mike Aviles.
Pitching Change: Ron Mahay replaces Brian Bannister.
Adrian Beltre hit by pitch.
Ken Griffey grounds into a double play, shortstop Mike Aviles to first baseman Billy Butler. Adrian Beltre out at 2nd.
Wladimir Balentien doubles (3) on a fly ball to left fielder David DeJesus.
Rob Johnson strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Juan Cruz replaces Ron Mahay.
Ronny Cedeno strikes out swinging.
Ichiro Suzuki singles on a ground ball to second baseman Willie Bloomquist.
Franklin Gutierrez lines out to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Jose Lopez strikes out swinging.
Mitch Maier remains in the game as the right fielder.
Pitching Change: Joakim Soria replaces Juan Cruz.
Russell Branyan strikes out swinging.
Adrian Beltre flies out to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Ken Griffey singles on a line drive to right fielder Mitch Maier.
Wladimir Balentien walks. Ken Griffey to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Mike Sweeney replaces Rob Johnson.
Mike Sweeney singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Coco Crisp. Ken Griffey scores. Wladimir Balentien to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Endy Chavez replaces Mike Sweeney.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Yuniesky Betancourt replaces Ronny Cedeno.
Yuniesky Betancourt walks. Endy Chavez to 2nd.
Ichiro Suzuki grounds into a force out, shortstop Mike Aviles to second baseman Willie Bloomquist. Yuniesky Betancourt out at 2nd.
Coco Crisp called out on strikes.
David DeJesus doubles (5) on a fly ball to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Mark Teahen grounds out softly to first baseman Russell Branyan. David DeJesus to 3rd.
Jose Guillen lines out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Billy Butler singles on a line drive to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Mike Jacobs grounds into a double play, second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan. Billy Butler out at 2nd.
Willie Bloomquist grounds out softly, shortstop Ronny Cedeno to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Miguel Olivo strikes out swinging.
Mike Aviles lines out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Coco Crisp doubles (8) on a ground ball to left fielder Wladimir Balentien.
With David DeJesus batting, Coco Crisp steals (5) 3rd base.
David DeJesus reaches on a fielding error by shortstop Ronny Cedeno. Coco Crisp scores.
Mark Teahen grounds out softly, first baseman Russell Branyan to pitcher Jarrod Washburn.
Jose Guillen grounds out, shortstop Ronny Cedeno to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Billy Butler lines out to second baseman Jose Lopez.
Mike Jacobs flies out softly to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Willie Bloomquist singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Miguel Olivo out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Jarrod Washburn to first baseman Russell Branyan. Willie Bloomquist to 2nd.
Mike Aviles singles on a ground ball to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez. Willie Bloomquist scores.
Coco Crisp grounds out softly, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan. Mike Aviles to 2nd.
David DeJesus strikes out swinging.
Mark Teahen grounds out to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Jose Guillen flies out to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Billy Butler grounds out, shortstop Ronny Cedeno to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Mike Jacobs strikes out swinging.
Willie Bloomquist strikes out swinging.
Miguel Olivo singles on a ground ball to third baseman Adrian Beltre.
Mike Aviles grounds out, pitcher Jarrod Washburn to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Pitching Change: Sean White replaces Jarrod Washburn.
Coco Crisp hit by pitch.
David DeJesus out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Rob Johnson to second baseman Jose Lopez. Coco Crisp to 2nd.
Sean White intentionally walks Mark Teahen.
Jose Guillen hit by pitch. Coco Crisp to 3rd. Mark Teahen to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Mitch Maier replaces Jose Guillen.

Billy Butler singles on a ground ball to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Coco Crisp scores. Mark Teahen out at home on the throw, left fielder Wladimir Balentien to catcher Rob Johnson. Mitch Maier to 3rd on the throw.
With Mike Jacobs batting, Sean White picks off Billy Butler at 1st on throw to Russell Branyan.
